posts.post_content:
One of the most underestimated cards of white pump. You don't even want to know how many times this has caught my opponent off guard. I typically use this with lots of tokens and fliers. It even comes in handy for defensive purposes.  
  
I like to think of this card as a mini [Overrun](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Overrun) with instant speed. VERY good! If you don't believe me, you've got to playtest it out yourself! 4.5/5
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
Criminally underrated card.

Posted By: Baconradar (9/16/2010 4:50:35 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: In a White Weenie deck, or even a multicolor swarm deck, this card is always a game changer if timed correctly. I've used it to win many games, and I've used it to save my creatures from damage sweepers like Earthquake and Slagstorm. Use it with Vigilance and/or First Strike creatures to really cause havoc.
posts.html:
